ComicInfo.Series: The Sixth Gun: Sons of the Gun
ComicInfo.Summary:
An untold story of the fourth horseman! Without the guidance of his beloved General, Silas "Bitter Ridge" Hedgepeth is lost and alone. When he stumbles upon a community teetering on the brink of calamity, he finds a new calling. Can he redeem himself if he saves the town? And is he a plague doctor... a preacher... or the embodiment of Death himself?
